subject: Interscholastic Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Canadian, Tex., has avoided the withering of a number of small towns from population shifts to urban areas. In Canadian, the high school, the football team and the town are inextricably linked by a sense of pride, tradition, innovation, high expectation and reinvention.
